label: Reitz 05431
description: Duewi ZW BJ ES 1000 / Reitz 05431 / ZWave.me 05457 Single button wall switch
info_overview: For wireless switching of: light bulbs, HV and LV halogen lamps or electrical equipment (e.g. fans). Combinable with all Z-Wave transmitters and remote controls, with installation in splash-proof junction box IP 44, can be selectively installed in flush-mounted power points and canopies or triggered directly via wireless rockers.
info_inclusion: Press 3x within 1.5 seconds the "UP" or "DOWN" button for the group on the remote control in which the device is to be included.
info_exclusion: In the case of a flush mounted module press 3x within 1.5 seconds either the "UP" 1 or the "DOWN" 2 button.
approved_export:

category_description: Any device attached to the wall that controls a binary status of something, for ex. a light switch

parameters.label: Automatic switch off
parameters.description: If not zero, automatically switch off after a user defined time

parameters.label: Function of RF off command
parameters.overview: Defines how to interpret RF Off command. Can be used in conjunction with Auto Off function: Ignore - to switch on the light by motion detectors and switch it off after some amount of time: in case of multiple motion detectors each would try to switch the

options.label: Switch on if load is off else switch off

parameters.label: Switch on dimming by buttons
parameters.overview: Defines if the switch should change it state to on/off if it is dimmed by buttons

parameters.label: restore switch state
parameters.overview: Defines if the switch should restore switch state to the last state prior to device power off (power cycle).

parameters.label: Typical click timeout
parameters.overview:
Typical time used to differentiate click, hold, double and triple clicks

Defined in 10ms ticks.

parameters.label: Switch by buttons
parameters.overview: If disabled, the local operations by buttons will not switch the load, but only send commands to On/Off association group. In this mode buttons are not linked with the switch anymore. They can be used separately: buttons to control remote device, switch w

parameters.label: Action on button single press or hold
parameters.description: Action on button single press or hold
parameters.overview: Defines which command should be sent on button single press or hold. Basic commands are sent to Association group. Switch All commands are sent broadcast.

Switch On/Off and Dim
options.overview: Switch On/Off and Dim (send Basic Set and Switch Multilevel)
